titleStmt.title: Old Jacobs accompt cast up and owned by one of his seed, a young lady &c., or, A sermon preached at Laurance Jury, Feb. 13, 1654 at the funerall of the honorable and most virtuous lady Susanna Reynolds wife to the Honorable Commiss. Gen. Reynolds / by Thomas Harrison.
titleStmt.author: Harrison, Thomas, 1619-1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Macock for Lodowick Lloyd, & H. Cripps,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
